channel.title: emacs on Jacmoe's Cyber Soapbox
channel.description: Recent content in emacs on Jacmoe's Cyber Soapbox

item.title: Welcome to my new blog
item.description: My new Emacs powered blog My old blog at WordPress only has one single post in it. I wrote it using Org-mode in Emacs, and used an extension to put it on WordPress. That was good. I had to perform a lot of tweaking to the HTML, however, and that has obviously put me off just writing blog posts. That was bad. So, I wanted something as easy as writing a blog post in my favorite writing environment, committing the changes to git source control, and pushing it to a remote repository to be hosted.
